about_the_game:
Experience a unique escape room adventure as you play Mystery Box: The Journey, where you will encounter a perfect blend of tactile exploration, challenging puzzles, and astonishing environments.

Take on the challenge of exploring mysterious locations and solving peculiar riddles, you won't forget the hours spent playing this puzzle adventure!

And that's not all! Challenges and fun don't stop after unlocking all the 10 boxes and escaping the location you're trapped in, because you can also play an extra mini-game called The Jackbox, which resembles the classic hangman game and requires you to guess a variety of words to obtain AI-generated wallpapers for your device, making your experience even more satisfying and enjoyable!

Embark on an escape room journey through a collection of cunningly complicated boxes filled with enticing enigmas and brainteasers to solve. Each level is full of intricacy and has a portal to a new, stunning environment

Unlock all the achievements and show the community how far you have gone, this will spice up your game experience!

Its simple user interface makes it easy to dive in but tricky to walk away from. A special blend of captivating escape room puzzles awaits you, ensuring an immersive experience that skillfully balances challenge and entertainment to keep you engaged for hours

How many words can you guess in this extra challenge? Insert a token in the Jackbox and find a hidden word within 5 attempts to win an AI-generated wallpaper that you can either save in your device

Interact with buttons, levers, and particular mechanisms to unlock several parts of the boxes

The game's audio is a product of a compelling soundtrack and dynamic sound effects, in order to make your escape room experience the most realistic ever!

Available in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese, and Russian.*

*The game language will change automatically based on the language settings of your device

XSGames is a solo indie game developer from Italy. I self-published the first Mystery Box chapter on the app stores in 2021 and got amazed by the awesome success it had with mobile game players.

Such results changed my life, so I hope you'll enjoy playing the Mystery Box escape room adventures as much as I love making them!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.15, or later
  • Processor: Intel x86 + Apple silicon (64bit OS required)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or Intel Integrated
  • Sound Card: FMOD compatible sound card

name: Mystery Box 4: The Journey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with 512MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 310 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
